message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this incredible product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm asking for $1,800,000.  I believe this reflects its true worth, but I'm open to discussing further.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,500,000. I believe this is a fair price given the market value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer.  While $1,500,000 is certainly a strong offer, I can't quite let it go for that price. Would you consider $1,650,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking $1,550,000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any higher.
